body:
[NOTE: This is not a leaving post, an attempt at getting unbanned, simply something done in good spirit and kind heart.]

I have realized over the past few days that I have come across as rude, or been a total dick to alot of people on Avicus. I will be addressing a few specific people here, if you would like to be removed from the post just ask me.

First and foremost,

pepetheassassin: I am so sorry. I know you deal with alot of stuff, and you didn't deserve to hear anything I said to you. If there is anything I can ever do to make it up to you, please let me know.

Pop: I know we're chill now, but I used to be an asshole to you. I just want to say sorry again.

MasterProX: I'm not sure if you remember or not, but I do. I said a few things to you a while back and I just want to say sorry to you.

This is a short list of people. Please, if I have ever wronged you in any way, tell me and I will make it up to you. I apologize to the whole Avicus community in general for being such a pain and general annoyance. I hope one day you all can come to forgive me, but if not I understand.

I would also like to give a big thank-you to my former team Cacalmarin for always accepting me and putting up with my nonsense. It means a lot guys, I really appreciate you all.

Warm regards,

Jacob S

title: Redemption/Apologies post.

replies.body: "I'm not sure if you remember or not, but I do." As do I — I'm not the type to forget people. Don't worry, though, all's good.
replies.body_tagged: "I'm not sure if you remember or not, but I do." As do I — I'm not the type to forget people. Don't worry, though, all's good.

replies.body: Even though you've done nothing wrong to me I still appreicate you for being brave enough to make a post and say sorry.
replies.body_tagged: Even though you've done nothing wrong to me I still appreicate you for being brave enough to make a post and say sorry.

replies.body: Takes courage to write something like this, good on you!
replies.body_tagged: Takes courage to write something like this, good on you!

replies.body: I admire you! ^.^ Takes guts to do this, to admit to your wrongs!
replies.body_tagged: I admire you! ^.^ Takes guts to do this, to admit to your wrongs!
